linkedConnectors_subtitle: Connect your Radix Wallet to desktop web browsers by linking to the Radix Connector browser extension. Here are your linked Connectors.
linkedConnectors_newConnection_subtitle: Open your Radix Connector extension's menu by clicking its icon in your list of browser extensions, and scan the QR code shown.
linkedConnectors_nameNewConnector_subtit: What would you like to call this Radix Connector installation?
linkedConnectors_nameNewConnector_textFi: Name this connector e.g. ‘Chrome on MacBook Pro’
linkedConnectors_removeConnectionAlert_m: You will no longer be able to connect your wallet to this device and browser combination.
linkedConnectors_cameraPermissionDeniedA: Camera access is required to link to a Connector.
linkedConnectors_localNetworkPermissionD: Local network access is required to link to a Connector.
linkedConnectors_incorrectQrMessage: Please scan the QR code provided by your Radix Wallet Connector browser extension.
linkedConnectors_approveNewConnector_mes:
This Connector will be trusted to verify the dApp origin of requests to this wallet.

Only continue if you are linking to the **official Radix Connector browser extension** - or a Connector you control and trust.
linkedConnectors_approveExistingConnecto: This appears to be a Radix Connector you previously linked to. Link will be updated.
linkedConnectors_unknownPurposeErrorMess: This type of Connector link is not supported.
linkedConnectors_changingPurposeNotSuppo: Changing a Connector’s type is not supported.
linkedConnectors_oldQRErrorMessage: This is an old version of the Radix Connector browser extension. Please update to the latest Connector and try linking again.
